Reviews.Title: “Irresponsible Management”
Reviews.Author: Aboo90
Reviews.Content: youre planing check hotel dont unless booked hotel 3 nights arrival 14th 2nd night told leave reason else reserved 1st july system wasnt slot computer wasnt told checkin date offered 2 windows expensive family checked spent money family fragrance hotel night cleaner service location wise exactly city center nor prime location close public transport singapore wish stay close sort public transport dont windows depressing window payed 130 night family suit thats considered expensive regard location comfort service quality finally fragrance hotel emerald road cheaper 89 night family fragrance cleaner friendlier staff helped person extra 3
